wikipedia_page.main: John Lowe (year of birth unknown – year of death unknown) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for Leeds, as a hooker, i.e. number 9, during the era of contested scrums.

response: John Lowe (born 1945) is an English darts player.

*  John Lowe (footballer) (1912–1995), Scottish football player

* John Lowe (musician) (born 1942), English musician
* John Lowe (martyr) (1553–1586), English Catholic priest and martyr
* John Lowe (Dean of Christ Church) (1899–1960), Canadian-born Vice-Chancellor of Oxford University
* John Lowe (American Horror Story), an American Horror Story: Hotel character
* John Lowe (executive), American business executive
* John Lowe (Indologist), Indologist
